questions.quote: So what? Somebody dropped an egg on my head as I went into my building last night.
Oh, please! I took you back. You know it, I know it, Vegetable Lasagna here knows it.
I was speaking earlier with Kramer and he mentioned something about a private jet to Paris?
Elaine, I feel a cold coming on. Could you get me a cold pill from the medicine cabinet?
Eh...Varnsen. Kel Varnsen. Actually, this room intrigues me. Why is it called the TV room?
He bothers me. I don't even answer the phone anymore because of him. He's turned me into a screener. Now I gotta go see him on Wednesday.
I need someone to go with me to Mr. Lippman's son's Bar Mitzvah.
So, has the summer of George already started or are you still de-composing?
Why don't they open up an entire store for the back? Call it, "Just Back." All back; No front. You walk in the front, you're immediately in the back.  Look, Elaine, tie carwash.
It's Martine. I think he's dying. He tried to kill himself with pills.
